string  FileName2 
) [static]

Compares 2 files and determines if they are the same or not.

Parameters:
FileName1 name of the first file
FileName2 name of the second file
Returns:
False if they are different, otherwise it returns true.

bool  Recursive,
CopyOptions  Options 
) [static]

Copies a directory to a new location.

Parameters:
Source Source directory
Destination Destination to move the directory to
Recursive If true it will go through all sub directories, otherwise it wont
Options Copy options, can be set to copy if newer, always copy, or do not overwrite
